short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Troll your friends and co-workers by randomly closing their Chrome tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Got some friends or co-workers that have way too many tabs open or leave their PCs unlocked? This extension is for you to install on their browsers.

Ideal for April Fools' Day. Hide the extension icon for prolonged head-scratching ;)

https://github.com/goncalor/tabtroll
